ComicInfo.Summary:
Dillon finally learns what happened to Annie, and realizes his relationship with Julie is going to be much more complicated than he thought. Meanwhile, Ivy returns to HeNRI and confronts Foster for the truth about Julie and the Beta Suit, only to find the atomic alloy is merely the tip of the iceberg!
Julie's suit blows a crater in the road and takes down Cain so they escape once more. Dillon is not happy at the unpredictability of the suit and starts to walk away saying that this is not something Annie would have been involved in, when Julie hears a voice in her mind and says words Annie once said to him. Shocked he grabs Julie and gets knocked out himself.
While Dillon dreams of Annie Cain has caught up to them again and blasts Julie into the ground intending to take the suits from her. In his dream Annie tells Dillon to take her to Will.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-11-27 14:42:20. [CVDB155163]
